ComicInfo.Summary: While Suture sits in jail, Sam & Twitch interrogate Osborne. Osborne confesses to what he and the others did to Gretchen Culver. In the interrogation room, Suture escapes and begins her rampage. At the station, Suture attacks the officers and follows Halliday and Deke as they leave the station, and steers their car into the East River. Halliday comes ashore to find Deke already strewn and sewn up, and becomes Suture's next victim. She is finally comforted by Sam & Twitch.
ComicInfo.Title: Carnival Of Souls
ComicInfo.StoryArc: "Curse of the Spawn" Blood and Sutures
